all_concepts: High reliability due to absence of mechanical moving parts
Good chemical compatibility and no leakage thanks to fused glass technology
Easy replacement of electronic sensor without emptying or depressurizing the plant
Direct mounting onto various types of compressors and tanks
Use in level monitoring applications for control of low viscosity liquids
technical_specs: The absence of mechanical moving parts ensures High reliability
Well consolidated steel with fused glass technology  ensures no leakage and good chemical compati bility
natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure for LC-XT/ LC-XP?
Which refrigerants are compatible with LC-XT/ LC-XP?

file_metadata.chunk_title: LC-XT/ LC-XP Optical Level Control Unit
key_concepts: High reliability due to absence of mechanical moving parts
Good chemical compatibility and no leakage thanks to fused glass technology
Easy replacement of electronic sensor without emptying or depressurizing the plant
Direct mounting onto various types of compressors and tanks
Use in level monitoring applications for control of low viscosity liquids
iconic_quotes: The absence of mechanical moving parts ensures High reliability
Well consolidated steel with fused glass technology  ensures no leakage and good chemical compati bility

qa_pairs.question: What is the supply voltage range for LC-XT/ LC-XP?
qa_pairs.answer: The supply voltage range for LC-XT/ LC-XP is 230VAC@50Hz / 115VAC@60Hz / 24 VAC@50/60Hz / 24VDC depending on selected model. This allows for flexibility in installation and operation.

qa_pairs.question: How does the optical level switch work?
qa_pairs.answer: The optical level switch uses an infrared-ray emitter and an optical receiver to detect changes in liquid levels. When the liquid reaches the sensor dome, a big amount of light is lost, allowing the sensor to sense its presence. This technology ensures high accuracy and reliability.

qa_pairs.question: What are the mounting options for LC-XT/ LC-XP?
qa_pairs.answer: LC-XT/ LC-XP can be mounted directly onto various types of compressors and tanks using M20x1.5 or 1”1/8 – 18 UNEF adapter. This allows for easy installation and flexibility in application design.

qa_pairs.question: What certifications does LC-XT/ LC-XP have?
qa_pairs.answer: LC-XT/ LC-XP complies with directives 2014/30/UE and 2014/35/UE, ensuring compliance with European safety standards. This certification provides assurance of the product's quality and reliability.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure for LC-XT/ LC-XP?
Which refrigerants are compatible with LC-XT/ LC-XP?
file_metadata.summary: The LC-XT/ LC-XP optical level control unit offers high reliability, good chemical compatibility, and easy replacement of electronic sensor. It can be mounted directly onto various types of compressors and tanks, and complies with European safety standards.
